name: Introduction to Astronomy
description: This course covers the basics of astronomy, including the history of astronomy, scientific methods, stars, galaxies, and the Solar System.

name: Astrophysics I
description: This course covers the basics of astrophysics, including stellar evolution, stellar populations, interstellar medium, and galaxies.

name: Astrophysics II
description: This course covers more advanced topics in astrophysics, including stellar dynamics, stellar atmospheres, and cosmology.

name: Galactic Astronomy
description: This course covers the basics of galactic astronomy, including galactic structure, dynamics, and stellar systems.
